articles.author: Benj Edwards
articles.title: Nvidia sells tiny new computer that puts big AI on your desktop - Ars Technica
articles.description: The 1 petaflop DGX Spark system runs AI models with 200 billion parameters locally for $4K.

articles.author: Sarah Perez
articles.title: Google’s Gemini can now help you schedule Google Calendar meetings - TechCrunch
articles.description: Designed for one-on-one meetings, the tool lets you insert available time slots directly into an email, automatically creating a calendar invite once a recipient selects a time.
articles.content: Google is launching a new tool that uses AI to make it easier for Gmail users with Google Calendar to schedule their meetings. On Tuesday, the company launched a Gemini-powered “Help me schedule” fea… [+1971 chars]

articles.author: Beth Mole
articles.title: Over 150 unvaccinated kids quarantined for 21 days in SC measles outbreak - Ars Technica
articles.description: The outbreak includes at least seven confirmed cases, but some are clearly being missed.
